justifications: Ringo Starr has praised Britain's decision to leave the European Union, saying Brexit will allow the UK to get back on its "own feet".
I was a huge fan when the EU started.
I have lived all over Europe so I thought 'how great'.
But it never really got together, I did not think.
But it never really got together, I did not think.
Maybe in a business way it got together but everyone kept their own flags… It did not really turn into a love fest.
